articles.author: Matthew Connatser
articles.title: No love lost between Apple and Nvidia as iGiant chooses Google chips for AI training - The Register
articles.description: Things are getting Tensor between Cupertino and Nv
articles.content:
Apple has detailed in a research paper how it trained its latest generative AI models using Google's neural-network accelerators rather than, say, more fashionable Nvidia hardware.
The paper [PDF], … [+3998 chars]

articles.author: Kit Roberts
articles.title: Chimpanzees appear ‘capable’ of human speech in mind-blowing resurfaced research footage - UNILAD
articles.description: The old footage shows the chimpanzee managing to vocalise the word 'mama' to researchers
articles.content:
Resurfaced footage from researchers investigating chimpanzees appears to show one chimpanzee recreating human speech.
Chimpanzees are among our closest relatives in nature, sharing almost 99 percent… [+2340 chars]
